basics.name: David Coxon
basics.label: Senior FullStack Engineer
basics.summary: Versatile Senior Developer with strengths in architecture. Great team player who can also deliver independently. Confident in leading other engineers. Dedicated to keeping it simple and making other developers' lives easier.

work.summary: Driving modernisation of web apps and practices
highlights: Created and implemented technical and deployment architecture to replace legacy web app with complex deployment requirements.
Introduced practices such as mono repos, componentisation and automated ui testing.
Delivered first phases of legacy rebuild ahead of schedule.

work.summary: Lead developer on high profile trading platform.
highlights: Designed and lead major technical revision.
Oversaw years without a single major production issue.
Trained multiple new joiners and graduates.

work.summary: Formerly Lockheed Martin. Worked on a diverse set of software projects across the transport sector.
highlights: Implemented a rest api and web front end for Air Traffic Control scheduler.
Crunched radar data to calculate fees for civil flights in UK Aerospace.
Integrated algorithm to optimise Heathrow runway usage.
